content: please note that this is an ad-free pdf version of a crochet pattern that can be found for free with ads on my blog here https //joyofmotioncrochet com/granny-square-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ ★ crochet cardigan for women ★ granny square cardigan crochet pattern ★ size xs to 5xl ★ skill level easy ★ language english / us crochet terms crochet granny square cardigan pattern the granny square cardigan is a size inclusive jacket crochet pattern with sizes from xs to 5xl you can make this granny square sweater using the traditional granny square the pattern includes the granny square cardigan layout in both photos & schematic pick your favorite colors & start making this beautiful piece pattern contains ☆ gauge ☆ pictures ☆ sizing & measurements inches & metric ☆ instructions ☆ & a bunch more details ★ also included follow up by email in case you need any help you will need crochet hook note use hook size according to the size you make necessary to make the sizing work for as many sizes as possible xs/s and xl/2xl/3xl size 5 5 mm / us i-9 / uk 5 m/l and 4xl/5xl size 6 5 mm / us k-10 5 / uk 3 yarn yarn used lion brand yarn wool ease in color fisherman ca grey heather cb denim cc rose heather cd cranberry ce forest green heather cf yarn amount used color a ca 4 4 5 6 skeins color b cb 1 skein color c cc 1 skein color d cd 1 skein color c ce 1 skein color f cf 1 skein yarn characteristics 4 medium yarn 80 % acrylic 20 % wool other materials needed needle
